Changelog
=========
0.5 (2013-01-16)
---------------------
- Showing related items widget. 

0.4 (2012-12-10)
---------------------
- Bugfixing

0.3 (2012-12-04)
---------------------
- Got rid of the dates after all, for events use Products.mediaEvent 

0.2 (2011-04-27)
-------------------
- Expanded location, Start and end date to cover events too.

0.1 (2011-04-26)
-------------------

- Initial release.
- Type defenition.
- No specific views yet.
